values:
So not much has really changed in my world. I still work and still attempt school(lol). Anyways, i feel the need for more, you know? Like i need more hobbies or four hundred new friends or something????? Anyways, just dropping in to say hi and stuff. So, happy holidays to you guys i i'm not back on in a bit. :] 


trav

The thoughts of nothing seem to fill my brain, of things with wishes and thoughts that can never happen. A state in which you think you can do something, or succeed in some way than others, but you can't you try but nothing happens. I need a change, a new place, a new school, a new something.....i just don't know what yet. I think that life just needs a mix up every now and then, i can't sit and wait for life, i'm gonna make it happen. I need something new , job, place,something. I'm not sure, i just can't sit on life, and thats what i've been doing. I just can't anymore. Grrrr......I need well....money first off.......and school......but i can't stand the same stuff. ..............i got nothin....i'm gonna go think more.....

So things have begun to roll around, speed up, then slow down. They've been going up and down and sideways and that ways and long ways and every ways. Things are just here and there, and nowhere. I'm so lost in translation that i might as well be deaf. I think the heart of it is just me, and that confuses things even worse then this post. 

So where do you go from a stand still, so many choices to make in life. Which ones are right, which ones are wrong?? Does anyone know, can anyone even help you figure it out? I have so many questions, with so many answers i don't have. I think i am having a id-life crisis at the age of 19. That alone confuses me. I feel so torn, but so complete. What is this feeling. I know, i know, life goes on, and such. But does life just pause and just confuse your head? Mine does. 

I think i just really really need to find that second job i've been looking for to get my mind off of things. Maybe that will help. I really hope it does. I keep crossing my fingers about finding a new and fun job, but i just can't seem to get hired anywhere. Oh well, i just keep looking.

In the meantime, wade leaves on the 10th. So that is fun, and by fun i mean exhausting. I don't know what to say to him when he leaves, shit, i don't even know what to think anymore about it. 

Alright, i guess i'm doing myself in on the rantingness.

Trav-0ut

So, i am currently working a ton. I am also looking for a second job, sounds fun right. I guess its not too bad, i'm staying busy so thats all that counts. I've been meeting a lot of new people lately, which is cool. A lot of different people, and a lot of new people at work; its fun. Life is pretty good i suppose. I don't really have much to comp[lain about, except my dad leaving again. So anyways, thats the update on me.

peace out

Ok, so the breaking story on my life at the moment is that my father is going back to Iraq on July 12th. Fanfuckingtastic. YES thats a word!

Needless to say i am quite upset right now. I just don't know what to think right now. Everything is blowing up in my face.

My mind is just spinning around and around. I just..........don't know....



T-out
Hi i'm alive, finals this week. love. bye

So school is slow, work  is slow, and basically my entire life is going slow. I don't really know whats up? I feel like i'm missing something. Like i just have a big void that has nothing. I don't mean depressionm i mean of course it comes with a little, but i mean like a void that i'm missing something really important in my life.As in maybe an activity, or a person, or something. Anyways, i just wanted to, well, just say that. 






trav-out

i was totally joking about the last post. Totally totally just messing around. ANd megan i am sorry about it. Don't be mad. 

Anyways i wanted to let you guys know that, and that i am 19 now wow, what a boring age to turn right?

Ok Merry Christmas! 

-T

So i took Colleen to a nice dinner tonight at my work, Niche. We had a really good time, and i really enjoy her company. I've missed her a lot. Anyways, finals are almost up, i onl have two more and i'm free! Anyways, pray for snow!


T
Everything is going pretty good, finals are coming up, and then a nice long break. It will be fantastic. Anyways, have a good weekend guys.
I find myself posting on this dumb thing a lot and i can't see why.......

So i am taking a break from my research paper presentation that is due tomorrow at noon. I have been reading books and articles for about 4 hours now. I finished one book, a third of another and read two articles. At least i will know all about human cloning inside and out, right?

Anyways, finals are next week, that is fun. I am excited to be off of school for a while, although i will be working a lot, ut oh well, a little less stress is always a good thing. 

My new friends at Webster are pretty cool, and i really like one of them, she is really fun. I have also made some random friends too, which is good as well. 

My classes for the spring are going to be fun, i have two more credit hours, so prolly more work, but thats ok by me, if i am interestedin the subject it sholdn't be that bad. 

anyways, i am just rambeling. Have a good night and  a good tomorrow guys.

T

So, as the title says, i am not okay. Thats it, i am not okay.

i don't know what i need to be or feel better, but i need something, or someone or i don't know!

ugh.....fuck.....i don't even know.

-T

I guess that is a maybe.












Those three wor.....ds.........
[notwhat you think]












I don't know what to say anymore. I have no idea. My mind has no words for how i feel right now. Most would call it clinical depression, but everyone gets that....this is something more, like a state of pure confusion and choas. Like my mind won't stop to just think. I feel lik a robot of sorts. As if i can't understand myself anymore. My thoughts, my feelings, what i am doing. And people confuse me on top of it. ugh................and no, this is no plea for advice, or that crap "oh it gets better, or i hope you feel better" Thanks but no thanks. I don't need people, at least i keep telling myself that. I just......i just don't know. I think i have feelings for a girl at my school, but i just can't do anything about it, and i feel dumb for even thinking that in the first place. AHH! FUCK! just fuck.....what is wrong with me? [don't answer that] 

Anways, i mean, school is going good, and work is well, work. I make good money so i guess that is good right? 

I miss my friends, well, i miss you guys. I miss tennis, and acting, and jazz. uhh....being an adult blows sometimes, wait all the time. I think i missed the drunken party part of my life, i need to catch up!


ok i am done and need to sleep.


out,

T

Did anybody notice that Grimace is Roneld Macdonelds' bestest retarded friend?



What do you guys think about Kristin and Patrick?

OK, so, life is ......well.......life....is.

So a lot of hings have been racing through my mind lately, and i don't know why. I am totally exhausted and all i am doing is typing these words right now, i I have been like this the past week, no make it three weeks. My brain just keeps going and i think about everything. I can't comprehend why my mind doesn't want to rest. Even when i do lay down to sleep, i just stay awake, eyes open uuntil i see the gray that fills my room. The things i think about are even weirder. I think about relationships, i think about school, i think about my family, i even think abou what the color blue would taste like, if we could taste it of course. Maybe i am cracking, maybe i am going nuts. I feel so torn about  so many things. 
I am meeting new friends, i miss old ones. I am starting new relationships, and i am in dire need of old ones. I don't get myself, is that a problem? REALLY< IS IT?!?!?!?

I feel good in the sense of school, work and my house. I mean work is easy and easy to catchup if i fall behind.Work is the same, i have one job, and i keep hearing from co-workers that i am quite good at this job of mine. And my apartment is finally pieced together how i want it right now, i have a desk,couch, table$chairs, DVD rack. It has all come together. 

I just can't seem to figure out what it is that is going on. I suppose a part of me just feels empty . I am the part of the milk glass that is half empty not half full. A shell without purpose or a soul.And man without a dream or friends to share it with. 

I have felt rather lonely lately, and being ho alone for 5 days doesn't help i bet. I need more fun, yes, i think that would do me good, more laughing i suppose, that is always a good thing. 

I twixt between thy self, 
in thine everlasting flame.

To start again and see 
again, are ever such my bain.

I feel thou arst so nine of me,
i look for those who weep.

I seek the ones who share my fate,
and sink beneath thine feet. 

And soon the morrow come and go,
as if we never live.

Until i find myself again, 
betwixt of me i bid.

To see mine own reflection, 
is not of one i hail.

To find my soul within 
myself i bid thine mind farewell.

To this i hold no consequence 
For me i must let go.

The day is long, but not so long,
that friends may come abold.

And this by told i am thine self, 
complete and nothing more.

For the morrow has come and gone by now, 
And seek i shall no more.


So no you see my situation i am in, I am confused, tired, and my mind is going non-stop. Anyways, i hope you all are doing well, and not going crazy like me.

love, travis

So , i passed all my first mid-terms with good grades, which makes me happy. I have been working a metric butt load thiss past month too, but thats ok i get money, and i bought a new printer with my first paycheck, it is pretty. Anyways, i  have been reconnecting with a lost friend recently and it makes me smile. I love who this person is, they are a great human being. Besides my random life, my niece and nephew have been getting sooooo big, maverick is talking like his own little person, i have conversations with him!! it is so cool!! 

Ok, i am in class so i gottta run.

Peace out guys, and be happy.

travis

ok, so the good news of the week is that i now have a wonderful, and perfect new couch and recliner, that....I GOT FOR FREE! Ok, it isn't that exciting, but i am excited. Anyways, things are going ok i guess.School, is.....school....so yep. I like all my teachers, but a few are mono tone and boring, but oh well, what can ya do right? I will hopefully get a job really soon too, so thats a good thing.

Ok, the crazy. We all know i am a little crazy anyway, but i am driving myself nuts! I am doing weird things all the time, ask patrick, and i don't know anymore. I honestly think i am losing my mind. i feel so overwhelmed with life right now, it is crazy. School, friends, family, girls/girl. and just ah!!!!!! I am going nuts, like mentallly nuts!!!


ok, i have to go to class, so peace out.

love,

T

ok i am weird, i don't know. Anyways, the last journal was dumb, i don''t even get it. So yeah, thats all.


peace,
t-rav

First things first. I just finished my first week and two days of college, and i admit that i love it and hate it at the same time. I love the freedom, the fact i am treated like my own person, and how peaceful it is. I hate that i have bills[ thats just life right?], and the fact that all my friends are gone. I miss people so much, especially ones who are 6 hours away.I guess this is one of those growing up things, who would have thought right? Anyways, i just finished painting my third car, i think i have a knack for it or something, or thats what i hear. I am also joining the Webster tennis team next week, how fun.The more i play the more i love the sport, and the more i push to be the best.All my classes are fun this semester and pretty relaxed, just a few papers here and there, not to bad.I miss all you peeps on Lj too, i want to see you people, COME SEE ME, NOW!!!! but really i do miss a lot of you guys, and it would be good to see you all soemtime or somethng.

Ok, besides the normal life or becoming a big boy.Life is ...well.....life. Oh i am getting an apartment too, if i didn't mention that already.




Every time i get up in the morning, i look in the mirror and wonder if i still know me? Do you ever feel that way? It keeps happening more and more often.It is as if you are loosing yourself in, well, yourself. As if you are running away from the person in you. I just stand there and look at myself and thoughts run through my head like a bullet. Things like, Ar you the person you want to be, or the person people want you to be? Or are you honest with youself anymore? Or even things like, Who are you ? And Where did Travis go? It is like i am living in someone elses body or something, as if my feelings aren't even mine. Like the thoughts and remnints of my old self are completely gone and non-existent.

Maybe i am just loosing my mind or going crazy, what else is new right?

Maybe i am not looking hard enough to find myself, i'm not sure, about anything anymore. My best guesstimation would be stress or fatigue or stress or fatigue or that i am actually worn out for once in my life. I do feel rather empty, empty in the sense of being out of fuel to go. Like my body wants to stop but my mind keeps pushing everyday. Day after day of strain on my body from lack of sleep, college, chores around my house i am still in, and work WORK on top of it. Now that i think more i do ache almost everywhere, and my left arm has been giving me trouble. If you don't know my left arm was motionless for a month after my Celica wreck, and i broke my shoulder blade. But i am still going and moving, i just feel slow.

ok after writing all that i realize it comes off as a little like complaining, or a lot, but oh well.

Anyways, i think i have the best conclusion that might help me out.  Maybe i am just dying?never know?



ok, i need sleep for my long day ahead.


love and things, 

oxox

T-out

that is what i nicknamed my new Wii. Yes i broke of all people , i'm not a big gamer but it is good fun i have to say. Anyways, i start Webster the 20th so thats fun, but i don't know where i am living yet???? anywho, i don't know, its late sleep time i guess. 


bye bye


travis

So i definitly have been doing a lot of thinking lately.well, and a lot of writing. I dunno, its like life with all your expectations and people who you love sit beside you just pass you by. Like your so caught up in whats right and whats wrong, whats cool,whats the way to be,and what life is all about. but when its all over, absolutly none of that matters. its none of those things. Life in all its justice is what you want YOU want it to be, not what someone says it should be, or the way it should be. The biggest problem with almost half the world is that they worry about how they're supposed to be and who they're supposed to be, and not on just who they are. Be yourself for christ's sake. Stop worrying about popularity and if bobby joe the coolest person ever is gonna like you and just be yourself. God damn its not that hard, just walk in front of the mirror and see what you are and find that person you are and be that , don't be someone or something your not. But then don't make my mistake buy trying to be yourself so hard that you look to your past and get stuck their on a bike accident. Yes, that could have happened diffrent , but it didn't and i can't change that, and i realize that.


anyways, just had to write.
so this week is going alright i guess. band is looking better,which is always good. 
school work isn't too bad, and life isn't too bad at all. well, i hope you guys all have a good week.

loveto all, 
trav-out

p.s.- rude or dumb comment = DON'T FUCKING TRY ME RIGHT NOW!

ok, so i've officially found out that i have no one. And don't post on here and say "ohh you have me". I really am not saying any of the follwing to throw a pity party so if you dont' care then stop reading now.
   Ok, so i really can't do ANYTHING right. I can't be a good, as we all know boyfriend. I can't at all be a friend. And i definely can't ever be a good or coring person. Apparently, i'm pretty much worthless. So i guess i'm gonna live my life without anyone. No one cares,but i still do. So i guess that means i'm the bigger person. I've tried i really have. I try to be nice, i try to care so much, and i try my hardest to please everyone. But i can't and i regret it.because i have no one. I mean geese. I know someone who was in a reltionship kinda like me and erin's and it took them less than a weeek to still be friends. and yet i still can't make her happy. I really just make erin's life horrible i guess. I dunno, i'm just breaking down right now, and have no clue what to do. I have no one to run to. I'm trapped. And i know i'm gonna regret half the things i just said. But i don't kow what to do. But i have no one. so i'll go. sorry for ever wasting anyones time. I still care and love you guys very much, and i thought i'd have someone when i needed them. But i guess my hard work at being friends, and trying to be a good boyfriend at once, have never, and never will be good enough. I feel so let down and betrayed by my best friends, and most of all by my best friend in the whole world. erin.

trav-out

Sorry, i shouldn't be talking like this but, i just, i just miss her..........

i gotta go , i'm haveing wettness from the eyes. bye.

I really feel like you left me right when i need you the most in my life. Between my mom hateing me, my dad regreting to know me, or claim me as his son. Then to top it all off, i'm loosing friends. But some think i'm strong, and i'll go on that.

~smile,so people think your ok, it works~
